text: True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.
The corrupted Dark Pegasi fly south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains to make their nests.
Secretly nurtured by Malekith, Black Dragons are enchanted with Dark Magic that corrupts and enhances.
Duriath Helbane, as a seasoned black ark commander, possesses an innate understanding of the intricacies of black ark growth and expansion.
Duriath Helbane has trained his Black Ark Corsairs to become masters of the art of deflecting arrows and projectiles with their blades.
Duriath Helbane's Corsair forces are known for their ruthless and audacious raids
Duriath Helbane's Black Ark Corsairs are masters of rapid, precision strikes.
Duriath Helbane has cultivated a network of spies and informants throughout the seas, making it easier to manipulate other factions or disrupt their operations.
Pour everything you have into it!
Duriath Helbane's deep knowledge of the seas and navigation aids him in the campaign map.
